/**
 * In DEV mode, clears the previously memoized values, globally.
 *
 * @return {Void}
 */
 
function __clear() {
  CACHE_KEY++;
  if (CACHE_KEY >= Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER) {
    CACHE_KEY = 0;
  }
}
 
/**
 * In DEV mode, enable or disable the use of memoize values, globally.
 *

 * @return {Void}
